summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing the Director to enter into a contract with the State of Washington, Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development, to provide support for the City's participation in planning for and conducting a joint state-local earthquake response exercise; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
